price: 18. Whereon the heaven will be cleft asunder? His Promise is certainly to be accomplished.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
